heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s, with some mid teens northeast. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered, light snow showers. Lows from 5 to 15 above east of the Greens, and mid teens to around 20 in the west. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, except gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Wednesday
text: Cloudy. Periods of snow, with 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 7 inches in the southern Adirondacks and southern Greens, and a trace to 2 inches and possibly mixing with rain in southern valleys, and in the Champlain Valley. Highs mainly in the upper 20s to lower 30s, with some mid 30s in southern valleys, and in the Champlain Valley, and some mid 20s northeast. South to southeast 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain Valley.
